org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: if [ "$VCenter_Hostname" == "xda" ];then VCentre_Hostname="10.8.87.43" elif [ "$VCenter_Hostname" == "xdb" ];then VCentre_Hostname="10.8.87.39" elif [ "$VCenter_Hostname" == "xdc" ];then VCentre_Hostname="10.8.87.40" fi if [ "$Enhance_Disk" == "1 GB" ];then Enhance_Disks="1" elif [ "$Enhance_Disk" == "2 GB" ];then Enhance_Disks="2" elif [ "$Enhance_Disk" == "3 GB" ];then Enhance_Disks="3" fi cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts vcenter_hostname: "$VCentre_Hostname" vcenter_username: "$VCentre_Username" hostname: "$Server" enhance_disk: "$Enhance_Disks" device_id: "$Drive_Letter" EOT

ansible-playbook check.yml -i inventory -e "ansible_user=$ansible_userid ansible_password=$ansible_password vcenter_password=$VCentre_Password" --tags precheck --extra-vars @/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts

ansible-playbook check.yml -i inventory -e "ansible_user=$ansible_userid ansible_password=$ansible_password vcenter_password=$VCentre_Password" --tags precheck_vconnection --extra-vars @/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts

ansible-playbook check.yml -i inventory -e "ansible_user=$ansible_userid ansible_password=$ansible_password vcenter_password=$VCentre_Password" --tags postcheck_snapshotcreated --extra-vars @/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts

ansible-playbook check.yml -i inventory -e "ansible_user=$ansible_userid ansible_password=$ansible_password vcenter_password=$VCentre_Password" --tags precheck_datastore --extra-vars @/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts

ansible-playbook check.yml -i inventory -e "ansible_user=$ansible_userid ansible_password=$ansible_password vcenter_password=$VCentre_Password" --tags medcheck_startup --extra-vars @/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/enhance_harddisk/hosts
